summary: AI tools platform with comprehensive documentation system
architectural_notes: Documentation system to be integrated as part of main application with dedicated Documentation section
Documentation will target both end users and developers with appropriate content separation
Documentation includes architectural diagrams, code examples, and detailed explanations for all major system components

existing_features.title: Create comprehensive documentation page for Static Pages Content covering About Us, Contact Us, Terms of Service, Privacy Policy, Cookie Policy, and Data Rights pages. Include the page structure, content strategy, component breakdown, code examples showing how each page is implemented, and best practices for maintaining legal content.

Create comprehensive documentation page for Dynamic Pages covering Homepage, Category pages, Tool pages, Dashboard, and Admin pages functionality. Include detailed explanations of routing, data fetching patterns, state management, component composition, and the relationship between pages and backend data.

Create comprehensive documentation page for Technology Stack with detailed breakdown of Motoko backend, React frontend, Tailwind CSS styling, Shadcn UI components, React Query data fetching, Three.js capabilities, and Internet Identity authentication. Include architectural diagrams showing how these technologies interact, code examples demonstrating key patterns, and explanations of why each technology was chosen.

For each of the 6 documentation pages, include architectural diagrams where appropriate. Create ASCII art or Mermaid-compatible diagram syntax to illustrate: credit system flow, frontend-backend integration architecture, technology stack layers, tool page component hierarchy, and authentication flow.

Ensure all documentation pages follow a consistent layout structure with: page title, introduction section, table of contents, detailed content sections with code examples, related resources links, and navigation back to documentation index. Use the same Shadcn UI components and styling as existing documentation pages.

Include workflow diagrams, code examples demonstrating correct patterns, and anti-patterns to avoid.

Update the Documentation Index page (/documentation) to include navigation links to all 6 new documentation sections alongside the existing 11 Internet Computer development guides. Organize sections into logical categories (Project Documentation, IC Platform Guides) with appropriate icons and descriptions.
Add routing configuration in App.tsx for all 6 new documentation pages using TanStack Router lazy loading pattern consistent with existing documentation routes.
